concept.title: Field Masker
concept.shortdesc: The Field Masker processor masks string values based on the selected mask type. You can use variable-length, fixed-length, or custom masks.

conbody.p: Use the Field Masker to mask sensitive string data. For example, you might use the Field Masker to mask social security numbers.

p.note: To mask non-string data, you might use the Field Type Converter processor to convert non-string data to String, then stream the data to the Field Masker.
